name: Check Status v1
description: Detects system status including drive type, TPM status, AD status, and computer name.

steps.name: Detect TPM Status
steps.command: (ls /dev/tpm* 2>/dev/null && tpm2_getcap properties-fixed 2>/dev/null | grep -i TPM2_PT_MANUFACTURER) || echo 'No TPM device found'

steps.name: Detect AD Status
steps.command: systemctl status sssd | grep 'sssd_be' | grep -oP '(?<=--domain )[^ ]+' || echo 'Not joined to AD'
